text: Vijay Kumar Kashyap is an Indian politician. He belongs to the Bharatiya Janata Party. He is a member of Seventeenth Legislative Assembly of Uttar Pradesh representing the Charthawal assembly constituency. He is 52 years old (2017) and a post-graduate. He has been appointed as Minister of state in a Yogi Adityanath cabinet on 21 August 2019. == References == Category:Uttar Pradesh MLAs 2017– Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Uttar Pradesh
title: Vijay Kumar Kashyap
